transcript:
Customer: Madam meri baat sun lo na usko call karke pucho ki bhai tumne baat ki thi kya interested usme aapne attend kiya tha interested show kiya tha second day second day number payment process karega.
Hello
Hello
Hello
Hello
Executive: Sir Pawan baat kar raha tha India Mart se sir ye apna Renuka clothing company hai sir to basically isme na primary number pe main connect kar raha tha sir baat nahi ho pa rahi thi.
Kya actually dusre link se baat ho rahi hai na sir abhi sir isko na ek feedback aaya tha sir lengthy kuch likh ke aaya tha sir uska matlab nahi samajh pa raha tha actually aapka concern open ho gaya tha to usme kuch problem aa rahi hai kya sir.
Customer: Sir kya kya kya samajh nahi sir.
Executive: Sir concern ek open kiya hua tha India Mart pe usme comment me likha hua tha sir comment me keval ye likha hua tha ki lengthy ek minute ye very lengthy aisa likha hua tha feedback me sir to main samajh nahi pa raha tha ki kya problem aa rahi thi sir waha pe.
Customer: pata nahi maine comment me maine likha tha.
Executive: Sir ho sakta hai primary number primary number kaun check kar raha tha sir 940 ha aur do ek do number hai dekhna padega yaar maine to nahi likha tha mujhe bhi kuch idea nahi.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha sir abhi Renuka clothing company ka kaisa already na sir renewal bhi pending tha sir isko finalize kar ha nahi abhi to usko pending hi rakhna hai kuch khas fayda hua nahi tha apna membership lene ke baad to abhi usko pending hi rakhna hai dekhte hai na.
Executive: Okay nahi sir lekin aap dekho na agar aap online hai visibility main aapko ek baar check karwa deta kya aap samajh nahi abhi to online nahi aa paunga main bahar hi tha.
Customer: Achcha abhi aap sir isme owner kaun hai aap hi hai ki koi dusra hai sir jo check kar sakte hai kaun owner is is company me sir kaun hai aap hi hai ki koi aur hai sir.
Executive: Kaun kaun hai owner ha owner owner sir owner ha main hu main hu ha.
Customer: Sir owner isliye sir main aapko na jo dikhana primary number pe hum continuously na contact kar rahe the 940 wala wo kiska number hai sir.
Executive: 940 ha wo ghar ka dala hai shayad papa ji ka number hai purana.
Customer: Achcha father ji ka number hai na sir achcha achcha isliye meri baat hui thi unse na sir to unhone kaha tha ki ek baar main apni visibility dekhna chah raha tha India Mart pe ki kya aa raha hai kyuki aapki jo listing aa rahi hai na sir product line ki apna manufacturing mein hai basically to usme jo listing aa rahi hai sir among 198 client me na sir jaise mens lower hai sir sabse jyada aapka sabse jyada iska demand aa raha hai mens lower ka theek hai sir ab mens lower mein jo aapki company aa rahi hai na sir wo apni third number pe aa rahi hai jo pehle number pe aa rahi hai sir company uska main aapko bata raha tha ki wo aapki hamare sath pehle se aat saal se vested hai theek hai sir Chindwada hai na sir apna location mein.
Executive: Ha Chindwada isme isme ha isme sir Renuka pehle pe aa raha hai ek Kana garment training center raha sir theek hai sir Kana garment training center hai iske baad Dilip garment hai matlab overall aap sir ek baar na dekho agar main baat karunga to aapko nahi dikhega main ye chah raha tha ki ek baar agar aap Google meet ke through aa jaye sir to main aapko na Google ke through kaise client hamare sath aa raha hai wo cheez main aapko dikhana chah raha tha discussion to over call bahut hua lekin sir kabhi na Google ke through aapko kaise client aa raha hai kya hai kaisi listing hai kitna client ko aapne return kiya ye sara cheez dikhana tha sir.
Customer: Isliye call kiya hua hai.
Executive: To isliye na to main available hoke main actually mera retail shop bhi hai to main shop pe tha abhi main to sham ko hi jaunga aap kitne baje tak rehte ho office mein.
Customer: Sir wo hai hamara 9 to 6 pm matlab 9 se 6 baje ke beech mein ye 6 baje 9 to 6 hai na ha theek hai main try karta hu 6 ke pehle aa jau.
Executive: Ha sir main ek baar na 5 baje aapko try kar leta hu 5:15 pe theek hai na aur agar nahi ho payega to fir mobile se hi hum login kar lenge theek hai sir ha bilkul bilkul sir hai na ye cheez hai sir ye sab jo Chinchwad mein hai na sir Kana garment wala India Mart ke sath vested hai aapki jaan mein isme abhi do teen deal na crack ki hui hai kariban 25 lakh ke kariban ka hai aur ye Pune ka bahut bada supplier hai matlab in the sense Pune mein na sir sport complex ke sath establish hua hai clear ho gaya to kya hai ki ab sardiya hai sir samajh rahe hain aur in sab chezo mein na sabse jyada iska demand to usme branding ka bhi tha inka khud ka lower branding ke sath ja raha tha to usme kuch logo aur ye sab company name bhi likhna tha to ye cheez tha chalo ek baar 5 baje 5:15 pe connect kar lete hai aur aap connect kar ok sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received lengthy feedback, doesn't understand.

- Wants to keep membership renewal pending.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the feedback comment.

- Executive offered to show client details via Google Meet.

- Agreed to connect at 5:00 PM to discuss further.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer at 5:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, google meet, renewal, visibility, clients
